text: "Crazy on You" is a 1976 song by American hard rock band Heart. It is from their debut studio album Dreamboat Annie. It went to number 2 in the Netherlands, number 13 in Belgium, number 25 in Canada and number 35 in the United States. It is about the Vietnam War. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Power pop songs Category:Heart (band) songs
title: Crazy on You
